review: The team at Valve has done it again. The Dota 2 is pretty much the same as Dota but just with more smooth, crisper grapchics. exhilerating, fun and addictive gameplay and most of all IT IS FREEEEEE!!!!!! Get this game, yo will not regret it (A billion times better than League Of Legends).
